improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero. Add check before division to handle case when y is zero.
The loop iterates 49 times.  Consider adding a check to ensure that the loop does not run for too long and handle potential performance issues.
The loop's range might be too large or needs adjustments to meet specific requirements.
The program divides x by y. If y is 0, a runtime error will occur.  Add a check to prevent this. For example, you might want to set a default value of 1 if y is zero.
